div.div: Connectionist Temporal Classification (mapping slices of sound to characters)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 440px; margin-left: 119px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.font:
Sorting:
- outliers
- sorting by duration
Augmentation:
- additive gaussian noise
- time stretch (resampling)
Spectrum generation:
- peak-normalize audio
- mel-spectrograms
- spectrum-augmentation
Label preparation:
Tokenization of transcription
